title: At the court at York, 28 Martii, 1642 His Majestie hath given me expresse command to give you this his answer to your petition.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publisher: By Robert Barker ... and by the assignes of John Bill,
notes: Text begins: That this petition (as some others of this nature) is grounded upon misinformation ...
